@pixeltrix

I saw *activesupport/lib/active_support/testing/performance.rb* , and I've little thinking ...

\`bundle exec rails -v\`.split(" ")[1]
  instead of Rails::VERSION::STRING, because we should remove *require 'rails/version''*

WDYT?

```
153             app = "#{$1}.#{$2}" if File.directory?('.git') && `git branch -v` =~ /^\* (\S+)\s+(\S+)/
154
155             rails = Rails::VERSION::STRING
156             if File.directory?('vendor/rails/.git')
157               Dir.chdir('vendor/rails') do
158                 rails += ".#{$1}.#{$2}" if `git branch -v` =~ /^\* (\S+)\s+(\S+)/
159               end
160             end
```
